title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1001.5 - Decisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1001.5 - Decisions

State Regulations
(a) Approvals. If
an application is approved, a certificate of approval under the seal of the
fund, executed by the chairman, the secretary or other designated officer of
the fund, shall be transmitted to the applicant. Copies of the application and
supporting documents shall be retained in the office of the secretary of the
fund. (b) Disapprovals. If an
application is disapproved, a statement of the fund's decision and the reasons
therefor shall be transmitted to the applicant. Copies of the application and
supporting documents shall be retained in the office of the secretary of the
fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1001.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
